decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Current Application: Cover Letter by Nexus Planning dated 1 September 2023, Design and Access Statement Addendum by Barr Gazetas dated 11/8/2023, ENERGY STATEMENT by Introba dated 14/06/2023; Noise survey and plant noise assessment update by Sandy Brown dated 16/05/2023, Sustainable Design and Construction Statement by Introba dated May 2023, 2002-BG-00-00-DR-A-30.605 P2, 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-20.202 P4, 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.601 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.603 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.604 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.607 P2, 2002-BG-ZZ-01-DR-A-20.203 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-04-DR-A-20.204 P2, 2002-BG-ZZ-05-DR-A-20.205 P2, 2002-BG-ZZ-06-DR-A-20.208 P2, 2002-BG-ZZ-R1-DR-A-20.209 P2, 2002-BG-ZZ-R1-DR-A-30.602 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.251 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.252 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.253 P3, 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.271 P2

P2021/2905/FUL: Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-B1-DR-A-20.201 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-20.202 Rev P2; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-01-DR-A-20.203 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-02-DR-A-20.202 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-03-DR-A-20.203 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-04-DR-A-20.204 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-05-DR-A-20.205 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-06-DR-A-20.208 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-R1-DR-A-20.209 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.271 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.272 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.251 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.252 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.253 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-20.254 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-34.601 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-XX-DR-A-21.602 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.601 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-R1-DR-A-30.602 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.603 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.604 Rev P1;
Dwg 2002-BG-00-00-DR-A-30.605 Rev P1; Dwg 2002-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-30.606 Rev P1; Waste Management Strategy by ARUP (July 2021); Sustainable Design and Construction Statement by Elementa (September 2021); Rainwater Harvesting by Elementa (September 2021); Planning Statement by Nexus Planning (September 2021); Noise survey and plant noise assessment by Sandy Brown (September 2021); Green Wall Planning Benefits and Management and Maintenance by Barr Gazetas (September 2021); Design & Access Statement by Barr Gazetas (September 2021); 1.02 Green Wall Details; 1.01 Green Roof Details


REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Removal / Variation of Conditions 2 (Drawing Numbers),4 (Green Wall Details), and 8 (Green Roof Compliance) of Planning Permission Ref. P2021/2905/FUL dated 27/05/2022 for 'Refurbishment and extensions to the host building, including facade alterations; extension to the reception; extension to the existing internal cafe pavilion and amalgamation into the main office use; installation of rain water tanks and screening at fourth floor level; provision of new cycle store facilities, waste compactor and electric vehicle charging points'. The following amendments are proposed: Increase in the size of the door within the courtyard; Movement of the MVHR unit and ductwork at first floor level; Alterations to the layout of the green roof at first floor level; Amendments to the downpipe / gutter and retractable roof above the ground floor rear extension; Increase in wall thickness to the ground floor east elevation of the courtyard and pavilion; Slight relocation of the downlight on the front fa√ßade; Alterations to the Bonhill Street Entrance including change in door/window design and use of an entrance ramp; insertion of a vent pipe roof of new reception area at ground floor; Entrance pavers adjusted to level changes; Alteration to parapets and timber decking extended at fourth floor level; and Relocation of cycle repair station and Sheffield stand in rear courtyard.
